Planning is what I refer to as a step by step procedure to accomplishment. It requires arranging things before acting.

I have noticed that so many people do not plan before they do things, they just do things anyhow. Do you make plans for your future, what you do, what you eat, what you wear, and all.

Planning requires information, and the information is what is needed for a successful pursuit. 

>“Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.” - Allen Saunders

Do you desire to change so as to become a better individual? Then start working on planning. Like Socrates said, "Anyone who will move the world, must first move".
